mapper.sql: RATIONID, SPOID, RATIONCOUNTS, FIRMID, OPERATIONDATE, RATIONLOAN, SERVICEFEE, SALES_ALLOCATIONRATIO, SALES_REBATERATIO, FIRMNAME, SALESID,RATION_SATE
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_IPO_SPO_RATION.NEXTVAL FROM dual
insert into IPO_SPO_RATION (RATIONID, SPOID, RATIONCOUNTS, FIRMID, OPERATIONDATE, RATIONLOAN, SERVICEFEE, SALES_ALLOCATIONRATIO, SALES_REBATERATIO, FIRMNAME, SALESID,RATION_SATE) values (#{rationid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rationcounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rationloan,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{servicefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salesAllocationratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salesRebateratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{firmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rationSate,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update IPO_SPO_RATION set SPOID = #{spoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RATIONCOUNTS = #{rationcounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIRMID = #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATIONDATE = #{operationdate,jdbcType=DATE}, RATIONLOAN = #{rationloan,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SERVICEFEE = #{servicefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALES_ALLOCATIONRATIO = #{salesAllocationratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALES_REBATERATIO = #{salesRebateratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIRMNAME = #{firmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALESID = #{salesid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RATION_SATE = #{rationSate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where RATIONID = #{rationid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select RATIONID, SPOID, RATIONCOUNTS, FIRMID, OPERATIONDATE, RATIONLOAN, SERVICEFEE, SALES_ALLOCATIONRATIO, SALES_REBATERATIO, FIRMNAME, SALESID,RATION_SATE from IPO_SPO_RATION where RATIONID = #{rationid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select d.name,d.brokerid,t.* from br_broker d left join (select * from ipo_spo_ration where spoid=#{spoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})t on d.firmid = t.firmid left join br_brokertype btype on d.membertype = btype.borkertype where btype.brokername = '承销会员'

SELECT COUNT(r.rationid) FROM IPO_SPO_RATION r left join ipo_spo_commoditymanmaagement c on r.spoid = c.spo_id WHERE c.ration_type ='1'
and r.FIRMID = #{IpoSpoComm.firmid}
mapper.update: update IPO_SPO_RATION set RATION_SATE = 2 where RATIONID = #{rationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
update IPO_SPO_RATION set RATION_SATE = #{rationSate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SPOID = #{spoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select c.spo_price,t.* from (select RATIONID, SPOID, RATIONCOUNTS, FIRMID, OPERATIONDATE, RATIONLOAN, SERVICEFEE, SALES_ALLOCATIONRATIO, SALES_REBATERATIO, FIRMNAME, SALESID, RATION_SATE from IPO_SPO_RATION s where RATIONID = #{rationid,jdbcType=DECIMAL})t left join ipo_spo_commoditymanmaagement c on c.spo_id = t.spoid
select b.firmid from br_broker b where b.brokerid =#{brokerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.name from m_firm t where t.firmid = #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update IPO_SPO_RATION set SERVICEFEE = #{servicefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where RATIONID = #{rationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
